Hydration: Staying hydrated is essential for overall health, and it can also help soothe a sore throat. Drink plenty of water, herbal tea, or clear broth to keep your throat moist and hydrated.
Rest: Get plenty of rest and sleep to allow your body to recover and fight off the cold. Lack of sleep can weaken the immune system and make it harder for your body to fight off the cold.
Vitamin C: Take vitamin C supplements or eat foods high in vitamin C, such as oranges, strawberries, and bell peppers, to boost the immune system and help fight off the cold.
Steam therapy: Inhale steam from a hot shower or a bowl of hot water to help open up the nasal passages and soothe a congested nose.
Garlic: Garlic contains compounds that have antimicrobial and antiviral properties. Eating garlic cloves or taking garlic supplements may help fight off the cold.
